channel.title: Minigame help

item.title: Minigame help
item.dc:creator: @butnugget butnugget
item.description:
@butnugget wrote:

ok, ill explain this as best as i can… i have a mini game kinda like most ppls barrows minigame… once there you kill a npc you use the key on a chest and another npc comes out and u keep doing it till the end… here is the code i have for it.

[code]if (useItemID == 4273 && atObjectID == 5162)
{
deleteItem(4273, getItemSlot(4273), 1);
sendMessage(“Grats, Round 1 is over, 4 rounds to go.”);
server.npcHandler.newNPC(2880, 2604, 3165, heightLevel, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(2880), false);
}

                            if (useItemID == 5585 && atObjectID == 5162)
                            {
			deleteItem(5585, getItemSlot(5585), 1);
                            sendMessage("Grats, Round 2 is over, 3 rounds to go.");
			server.npcHandler.newNPC(49, 2601, 3162, heightLevel, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(49), false);
                            }[/code]

what i want it to do is instead of dropping keys to a chest… when the npc dies i want it to tele me to a differnt location untill the end then use a key on the chest for the end to get your prize. what would i have to change to do this?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 08, 2008, 09:40:23 PM[/size][hr]anyone know?

Read full topic
